TEXT.English: To hire a mercenary, click on the "axe" icon in the upper left hand side of the screen.
TEXT.Chinese: To hire a mercenary, click on the "axe" icon in the upper left hand side of the screen.

TEXT.English: If you can read any of French, German, Italian, Spanish or Portuguese, you could help us translate this mod into that language.
TEXT.Chinese: If you can read any of French, German, Italian, Spanish or Portuguese, you could help us translate this mod into that language.

TEXT.English: Combining more oppressive civics with more liberal ones will result in a stability penalty.
TEXT.Chinese: Combining more oppressive civics with more liberal ones will result in a stability penalty.

TEXT.English: You can check the parameters influencing your stability in the Financial Advisor.
TEXT.Chinese: You can check the parameters influencing your stability in the Financial Advisor.

TEXT.English: RFC Europe is based on Rhye's and Fall of Civilization. You can visit the official site for the original mod at http://rhye.civfanatics.net
TEXT.Chinese: RFC Europe is based on Rhye's and Fall of Civilization. You can visit the official site for the original mod at http://rhye.civfanatics.net

TEXT.English: In RFC Europe plagues are often fatal, and nothing can keep you safe from them.
TEXT.Chinese: In RFC Europe plagues are often fatal, and nothing can keep you safe from them.

TEXT.English: For RFC Europe discussions and lots of additional information about RFCE visit the mod forum at Civfanatics: http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=386
TEXT.Chinese: For RFC Europe discussions and lots of additional information about RFCE visit the mod forum at Civfanatics: http://forums.civfanatics.com/forumdisplay.php?f=386

TEXT.English: In RFC Europe contacts are permanent and all nations establish contact with the Pope when Catholicism first spread to their cities.
TEXT.Chinese: In RFC Europe contacts are permanent and all nations establish contact with the Pope when Catholicism first spread to their cities.

TEXT.English: Embassies have been removed from RFC Europe, all contacts are permanent in the mod.
TEXT.Chinese: Embassies have been removed from RFC Europe, all contacts are permanent in the mod.

TEXT.English: Every now and then the Pope would call upon the Catholic nations to go on a Crusade. This may provide either danger or opportunity for you.
TEXT.Chinese: 教宗将不时的号召天主教国家参与十字军东征。这可能为你提供任何的危险与机会。

TEXT.English: The Hungarian Vgvr is an excellent defensive building, damaging all enemy units within 2 tiles of the city.
TEXT.Chinese: The Hungarian Vgvr is an excellent defensive building, damaging all enemy units within 2 tiles of the city.

TEXT.English: Janissaries were the elite guards of the Ottoman Sultans and were drafted from the conquered Christian population in the Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: Janissaries were the elite guards of the Ottoman Sultans and were drafted from the conquered Christian population in the Empire.

TEXT.English: The only way in and out of the Black Sea is via the Bosporus near Constantinople (Istanbul).
TEXT.Chinese: The only way in and out of the Black Sea is via the Bosporus near Constantinople (Istanbul).

TEXT.English: If you get a skull over your cities, it means they have the plague! The population and units in the city and in the surrounding region will probably decrease dramatically. To reduce the effects and the duration of plague, keep your cities healthy.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果你在你的城市得到一个骷髅，这意味着瘟疫袭击了你的城市！城市人口和周边地区的单位生命可能会急剧下降。为了降低瘟疫的影响，请保持城市在健康状态。

TEXT.English: Plague can spread in many ways - through trade routes, along roads and between neighbouring cities.
TEXT.Chinese: Plague can spread in many ways - through trade routes, along roads and between neighbouring cities.

TEXT.English: The civilization you choose to play affects your difficulty every bit as much as the difficulty level you choose. Make sure to pick a civ that suits your playing style and your level of expertise.
TEXT.Chinese: The civilization you choose to play affects your difficulty every bit as much as the difficulty level you choose. Make sure to pick a civ that suits your playing style and your level of expertise.

TEXT.English: Every civ has hidden modifiers that influence their growth. This way, modern civs are not disadvantaged by their late start.
TEXT.Chinese: 每个文明都有一些影响其发展的隐藏属性。通过这种设置，后起的文明将不至于在竞争中处于劣势。

TEXT.English: You can declare war on independent states and minor civs simply by moving your units into their territory.
TEXT.Chinese: You can declare war on independent states and minor civs simply by moving your units into their territory.

TEXT.English: You can become a colonial power by building colonial projects and establishing monopoly over exotic goods.
TEXT.Chinese: 你可以通过建造殖民地成为一个殖民大国，确立贸易商品的垄断地位。

TEXT.English: Merchant Republic is a great Civic, for a peaceful commercial Empire.
TEXT.Chinese: Merchant Republic is a great Civic, for a peaceful commercial Empire.

TEXT.English: Combining certain civics will improve or harm the stability of your empire.
TEXT.Chinese: 某些内政法令组合可能提升或降低国家稳定度。

TEXT.English: Keep track of the current year, this mod spans from 500 AD to 1800 AD in 500 turns.
TEXT.Chinese: Keep track of the current year, this mod spans from 500 AD to 1800 AD in 500 turns.

TEXT.English: Remember that you can always take control of a newborn civ if you don't like the civilization you started with. You can also use this feature to play from 500AD even when you want to pick a civ that starts later on.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果你不喜欢开局时选择的文明，可以在新文明诞生时接手该文明。因此即使你想要控制的文明诞生时间较晚，仍然可以在公元500年开始游戏。

TEXT.English: Combining Religious Law and Religious Tolerance is not a good idea.
TEXT.Chinese: Combining Religious Law and Religious Tolerance is not a good idea.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization and RFC Europe, vassals can declare war.
TEXT.Chinese: 在“Rhye's文明的兴衰欧洲”中，附庸国可以宣战。

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization and RFC Europe, movement through ocean tiles costs ?a movement point.
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization and RFC Europe, movement through ocean tiles costs ?a movement point.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization and RFC Europe, the max income from a shrine is 20 gold per turn.
TEXT.Chinese: 在“Rhye's文明的兴衰欧洲”中，圣城每回合的最高收入为20金币。

TEXT.English: RFC Europe introduces many wonders which correspond to the time period and the nations not included in standard Civilization.
TEXT.Chinese: RFC Europe introduces many wonders which correspond to the time period and the nations not included in standard Civilization.

TEXT.English: In RFC Europe, vassal states are enabled by the discovery of the Vassalage tech.
TEXT.Chinese: 在“RFC欧洲”中，附庸国通过发现分封制度科技启用。

TEXT.English: While in RFC you can hire out one of your units as a Mercenary and another civ may hire it, this feature is disabled in RFCE. In our mod all potential mercenaries come from a global mercenary pool instead.
TEXT.Chinese: While in RFC you can hire out one of your units as a Mercenary and another civ may hire it, this feature is disabled in RFCE. In our mod all potential mercenaries come from a global mercenary pool instead.

TEXT.English: If you have have a bug to report, have any ideas how to improve the mod, or just simply like RFCE, make sure to check out the development forum at CivFanatics.com.
TEXT.Chinese: If you have have a bug to report, have any ideas how to improve the mod, or just simply like RFCE, make sure to check out the development forum at CivFanatics.com.

TEXT.English: If it's been a while since the last time you got an updated version of the mod, make sure to check CivFanatics.com for a new version. The mod is in active development, and updates are uploaded often. Every update is full of fixes and new features.
TEXT.Chinese: 请访问CivFanatics.com网站的专题论坛查看本模组更新情况，及时下载最新版本。本模组的更新相当频繁的，新版本会修正原有错误并增加特色内容。

TEXT.English: Creating an enormous empire may seem tempting, but you have to be very careful not to let your expansion destabilize your empire! The Expansion Civics can help with that.
TEXT.Chinese: 建立一个巨大的帝国是很有诱惑力的目标，但请注意过度扩张会导致国家的不稳定！实行扩张主义法令有助于保持大帝国的稳定。

TEXT.English: Check the files in the Reference folder for details on some of the new features in RFCE.
TEXT.Chinese: Check the files in the Reference folder for details on some of the new features in RFCE.

TEXT.English: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization and RFC Europe, camera flying mode hotkey has changed to [CTRL + F].
TEXT.Chinese: In Rhye's and Fall of Civilization and RFC Europe, camera flying mode hotkey has changed to [CTRL + F].

TEXT.English: RFC Europe has many new terrain types and resources, to be able to better represent medieval Europe in the mod.
TEXT.Chinese: RFC Europe has many new terrain types and resources, to be able to better represent medieval Europe in the mod.

TEXT.English: RFC Europe has a completely reworked mod-specific technology tree, with lots of new techs from the Middle Ages.
TEXT.Chinese: RFC Europe has a completely reworked mod-specific technology tree, with lots of new techs from the Middle Ages.

TEXT.English: If you attempt to stop the growth of newborn civs, some of your units will flip to their side.
TEXT.Chinese: 如果你决定镇压新诞生的文明，你的部分单位可能叛离。

TEXT.English: RFC Europe has several new unit types which significantly change the combat mechanics.
TEXT.Chinese: RFC Europe has several new unit types which significantly change the combat mechanics.

TEXT.English: You can do religious persecutions with the Prosecutor unit. Having many foreign religions in your cities will hurt your stability severely, so use them!
TEXT.Chinese: You can do religious persecutions with the Prosecutor unit. Having many foreign religions in your cities will hurt your stability severely, so use them!

TEXT.English: Moorland is a new type of terrain with limited ability to be worked.
TEXT.Chinese: 沼泽地是限制工作能力的新地块类型。

TEXT.English: Light cavalry are fast and have high withdrawal rates; use them to pillage land and to harass the enemy.
TEXT.Chinese: 轻骑兵速度快且具有较高的撤退几率；用他们来掠夺设施和骚扰敌人是一个不错的选择。

TEXT.English: If you feel you are too tired to keep playing, there's always coffee...
TEXT.Chinese: If you feel you are too tired to keep playing, there's always coffee...

TEXT.English: Keep in mind that snacks are only good in moderation.
TEXT.Chinese: Keep in mind that snacks are only good in moderation.

TEXT.English: In RFC Europe, the map is divided into historical provinces, which determine AI wars, your stability and historical goals. To see the name of a province, just hover your pointer over a map tile.
TEXT.Chinese: 在“RFC欧洲”中地图被划分成了若干历史地区，AI的战争范围、扩张对稳定的影响以及历史胜利的目标都由其决定。要查询一个地区的名字，只需将鼠标指针移动到这个地区。

TEXT.English: If you hold down the "Ctrl" key while hovering over the map, you can highlight the provinces' borders.
TEXT.Chinese: If you hold down the "Ctrl" key while hovering over the map, you can highlight the provinces' borders.

TEXT.English: In order to qualify for "controlling" a province for your historical goals, you need to make sure that all cities in the province are yours, or you own all tiles (by cultural expansion) in the province.
TEXT.Chinese: In order to qualify for "controlling" a province for your historical goals, you need to make sure that all cities in the province are yours, or you own all tiles (by cultural expansion) in the province.

TEXT.English: Press the "Ctrl" key and hover over a tile to see which Province it is in.
TEXT.Chinese: Press the "Ctrl" key and hover over a tile to see which Province it is in.

TEXT.English: You can easily keep track of the progress of your UHVs in the Victory Screen (F8).
TEXT.Chinese: You can easily keep track of the progress of your UHVs in the Victory Screen (F8).

TEXT.English: Don't let another civilization keep cities in your core territory. It will seriously hurt your stability!
TEXT.Chinese: Don't let another civilization keep cities in your core territory. It will seriously hurt your stability!

TEXT.English: Watch out for minor civs. Their national identity is very high, so you can expect revolts if conquering them!
TEXT.Chinese: Watch out for minor civs. Their national identity is very high, so you can expect revolts if conquering them!

TEXT.English: Golden Ages have an additional benefit in RFCE (compared to vanilla RFC): there is no anarchy when you change your civics.
TEXT.Chinese: Golden Ages have an additional benefit in RFCE (compared to vanilla RFC): there is no anarchy when you change your civics.

TEXT.English: Watch out for changing civics. Combining the right ones have huge advantages, but do not switch too often. Every turn you spend in anarchy can permanently cause stability points loss!
TEXT.Chinese: Watch out for changing civics. Combining the right ones have huge advantages, but do not switch too often. Every turn you spend in anarchy can permanently cause stability points loss!

TEXT.English: You cannot proclaim a state religion while you are at Paganism. You have to change your civics first, then declare your state religion.
TEXT.Chinese: You cannot proclaim a state religion while you are at Paganism. You have to change your civics first, then declare your state religion.

TEXT.English: You cannot prosecute a religion from cities where this religion is tied to one or more wonders/shrines. So if you play with Spain and want to win by UHVs, don't feel bad if you raze cities with such wonders.
TEXT.Chinese: You cannot prosecute a religion from cities where this religion is tied to one or more wonders/shrines. So if you play with Spain and want to win by UHVs, don't feel bad if you raze cities with such wonders.

TEXT.English: Check out the progress on the colonies as the game advances in the new Colony Information Screen. You can easily find out which colonies are already completed, and what parts of the world is still waiting for you. It's under the 5th tab in the Info Screen (F9).
TEXT.Chinese: Check out the progress on the colonies as the game advances in the new Colony Information Screen. You can easily find out which colonies are already completed, and what parts of the world is still waiting for you. It's under the 5th tab in the Info Screen (F9).

TEXT.English: In RFC Europe, some unique mercenaries can only be hired if you have a city in or near their native province.
TEXT.Chinese: In RFC Europe, some unique mercenaries can only be hired if you have a city in or near their native province.

TEXT.English: Stability can ruin your games if you overexpand. Make sure you build as many stability boosting buildings (Manor House, Courthouse, Castle and Night Watch) as possible in all your cities.
TEXT.Chinese: Stability can ruin your games if you overexpand. Make sure you build as many stability boosting buildings (Manor House, Courthouse, Castle and Night Watch) as possible in all your cities.

TEXT.English: You cannot trade techs you didn't discover yourself, also your newly discovered techs cannot be traded for 10 turns.
TEXT.Chinese: You cannot trade techs you didn't discover yourself, also your newly discovered techs cannot be traded for 10 turns.

TEXT.English: Don't be surprised if the AI of small civs value techs surprisingly high: One of the factors modifying your tech costs is the size of your empire.
TEXT.Chinese: Don't be surprised if the AI of small civs value techs surprisingly high: One of the factors modifying your tech costs is the size of your empire.

TEXT.English: In RFC Europe you cannot declare war on newly spawned civs for 5 turns.
TEXT.Chinese: In RFC Europe you cannot declare war on newly spawned civs for 5 turns.

TEXT.English: You won't get a huge diplo boost just for sharing a religion with another civ. You have to earn faith points in the common religion to be recognized.
TEXT.Chinese: You won't get a huge diplo boost just for sharing a religion with another civ. You have to earn faith points in the common religion to be recognized.

TEXT.English: The scrolling image in the loading screen of RFCE is the Bayeux Tapestry, a nearly 70 metres long and 50 centimetres tall embroidered cloth made in the 1070s, which depicts the events leading up to the Norman conquest of England.
TEXT.Chinese: The scrolling image in the loading screen of RFCE is the Bayeux Tapestry, a nearly 70 metres long and 50 centimetres tall embroidered cloth made in the 1070s, which depicts the events leading up to the Norman conquest of England.

TEXT.English: Be sure to check out the Colony Screen - you can find it in the Info Screen (F9) - and follow the progress of European dominance throughout the World!
TEXT.Chinese: Be sure to check out the Colony Screen - you can find it in the Info Screen (F9) - and follow the progress of European dominance throughout the World!

TEXT.English: Open the victory screen to view more detailed information about your civ's Unique Historical Victory.
TEXT.Chinese: Open the victory screen to view more detailed information about your civ's Unique Historical Victory.

TEXT.English: In RFCE the following straits are passable by both naval and land units: Oresund, Bosporus, Dardanelles
TEXT.Chinese: In RFCE the following straits are passable by both naval and land units: Oresund, Bosporus, Dardanelles

TEXT.English: In RFCE diagonally connected land tiles are passable for naval units too. The narrow straits of Bosporus, Dardanelles, Oresund are represented this way, also this makes naval movement more realistic between small groups of islands.
TEXT.Chinese: In RFCE diagonally connected land tiles are passable for naval units too. The narrow straits of Bosporus, Dardanelles, Oresund are represented this way, also this makes naval movement more realistic between small groups of islands.

TEXT.English: Naval units can pass foreign territory without signing open borders with the owner or declaring war on them!
TEXT.Chinese: Naval units can pass foreign territory without signing open borders with the owner or declaring war on them!

TEXT.English: Sleep is for the weak! RFCE is for the bold!
TEXT.Chinese: Sleep is for the weak! RFCE is for the bold!

TEXT.English: Yeah, I can get behind this. Just load back your game, it's not that late. You will get some sleep tomorrow. Or next week.
TEXT.Chinese: Yeah, I can get behind this. Just load back your game, it's not that late. You will get some sleep tomorrow. Or next week.

TEXT.English: Your nation needs you more than ever, don't you dare to leave your people alone until you reach that UHV!
TEXT.Chinese: Your nation needs you more than ever, don't you dare to leave your people alone until you reach that UHV!

TEXT.English: You know you shouldn't continue playing. Yeah, I'm talking to you, no more "just one more turn". Seriously, stop... you have work to do!
TEXT.Chinese: You know you shouldn't continue playing. Yeah, I'm talking to you, no more "just one more turn". Seriously, stop... you have work to do!

TEXT.English: RNG can be a b*tch... Get over it quickly, it will come back. Theoretically :P
TEXT.Chinese: RNG can be a b*tch... Get over it quickly, it will come back. Theoretically :P

TEXT.English: The opening image of the mod is depicting the fall of Acre in 1291: "Guillaume de Clermont defending the walls at the Siege of Acre, 1291", by Dominique Papety.
TEXT.Chinese: The opening image of the mod is depicting the fall of Acre in 1291: "Guillaume de Clermont defending the walls at the Siege of Acre, 1291", by Dominique Papety.

TEXT.English: Under most religious civics your nation's stability highly depends on your religious unity. So try not to keep multiple religions in your cities unless you run Religious Tolerance; use those Prosecutors!
TEXT.Chinese: Under most religious civics your nation's stability highly depends on your religious unity. So try not to keep multiple religions in your cities unless you run Religious Tolerance; use those Prosecutors!

TEXT.English: If you hold down the "Shift" key while hovering over the map, you can check all civilizations' spawn zones. Same with the "Alt" key and respawn zones. Take a look before you decide where to expand!
TEXT.Chinese: If you hold down the "Shift" key while hovering over the map, you can check all civilizations' spawn zones. Same with the "Alt" key and respawn zones. Take a look before you decide where to expand!

TEXT.English: "To eat your fill but not apply your mind to anything all day is a problem. Are there no games to play? Even that would be smarter than doing nothing." - Confucius
TEXT.Chinese: "To eat your fill but not apply your mind to anything all day is a problem. Are there no games to play? Even that would be smarter than doing nothing." - Confucius

TEXT.English: "The essence of strategy is choosing what not to do." - Michael Porter
TEXT.Chinese: "The essence of strategy is choosing what not to do." - Michael Porter

TEXT.English: "Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake." - Napoleon Bonaparte
TEXT.Chinese: "Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake." - Napoleon Bonaparte

TEXT.English: "I speak Spanish to God, Italian to women, French to men, and German to my horse." - Charles V
TEXT.Chinese: "I speak Spanish to God, Italian to women, French to men, and German to my horse." - Charles V

TEXT.English: "All men can see these tactics whereby I conquer, but what none can see is the strategy out of which victory is evolved." - Sun Tzu
TEXT.Chinese: "All men can see these tactics whereby I conquer, but what none can see is the strategy out of which victory is evolved." - Sun Tzu

TEXT.English: "Onward, Christian soldiers, marching as to war, with the cross of Jesus going on before. Christ, the royal Master, leads against the foe; forward into battle see His banners go!" - Sabine Baring-Gould
TEXT.Chinese: "Onward, Christian soldiers, marching as to war, with the cross of Jesus going on before. Christ, the royal Master, leads against the foe; forward into battle see His banners go!" - Sabine Baring-Gould

TEXT.English: Use your mouse wheel to zoom.
TEXT.Chinese: Use your mouse wheel to zoom.

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + I] to play with a minimized interface. Press [ALT-I] to play with no interface.
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + I] to play with a minimized interface. Press [ALT-I] to play with no interface.

TEXT.English: You can use the mouse wheel or [PAGE UP] and [PAGE DOWN] to zoom the camera in and out...
TEXT.Chinese: You can use the mouse wheel or [PAGE UP] and [PAGE DOWN] to zoom the camera in and out...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + S] to Save the Game and [CTRL + L] to Load a saved game...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + S] to Save the Game and [CTRL + L] to Load a saved game...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + (LEFT ARROW)] or [CTRL + (RIGHT ARROW)] to rotate and set the camera by 45 degrees...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + (LEFT ARROW)] or [CTRL + (RIGHT ARROW)] to rotate and set the camera by 45 degrees...

TEXT.English: Double clicking on a stack of units will group them together...
TEXT.Chinese: Double clicking on a stack of units will group them together...

TEXT.English: Hold down ALT and click on a stack to select all units...
TEXT.Chinese: Hold down ALT and click on a stack to select all units...

TEXT.English: Hold down CTRL and click on a stack to select all units of the same type...
TEXT.Chinese: Hold down CTRL and click on a stack to select all units of the same type...

TEXT.English: With multiple units selected, you can give the group orders that they will conduct together.
TEXT.Chinese: With multiple units selected, you can give the group orders that they will conduct together.

TEXT.English: Right clicking on a transport will automatically load the units onto it...
TEXT.Chinese: Right clicking on a transport will automatically load the units onto it...

TEXT.English: With a transport selected, right clicking on an adjacent land square will automatically unload the units...
TEXT.Chinese: With a transport selected, right clicking on an adjacent land square will automatically unload the units...

TEXT.English: Press [F12] to access the Civilopedia...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [F12] to access the Civilopedia...

TEXT.English: Press [PRINT SCREEN] to take a screenshot (It will be saved in your Civ4\Screenshots folder)...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [PRINT SCREEN] to take a screenshot (It will be saved in your Civ4\Screenshots folder)...

TEXT.English: Press [ESC] to bring up the in-game Options Menu...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [ESC] to bring up the in-game Options Menu...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + O] to bring up the Options Menu...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + O] to bring up the Options Menu...

TEXT.English: Press the middle mouse button to center the camera on the active unit...
TEXT.Chinese: Press the middle mouse button to center the camera on the active unit...

TEXT.English: Press [SHIFT + F5] (Single Player Only) to Quick Save...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [SHIFT + F5] (Single Player Only) to Quick Save...

TEXT.English: Press [SHIFT + F8] (Single Player Only) to Quick Load...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [SHIFT + F8] (Single Player Only) to Quick Load...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + # key] to bind the selected unit to that # key. For example: [CTRL + 3] would make it so anytime 3 is pressed, that unit is automatically selected...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + # key] to bind the selected unit to that # key. For example: [CTRL + 3] would make it so anytime 3 is pressed, that unit is automatically selected...

TEXT.English: While in the city screen, press [CTRL + # key] to save the production queue. This queue can be loaded in any other city by pressing the # key...
TEXT.Chinese: While in the city screen, press [CTRL + # key] to save the production queue. This queue can be loaded in any other city by pressing the # key...

TEXT.English: Press [F11] to quickly switch in and out of Globe View...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [F11] to quickly switch in and out of Globe View...

TEXT.English: While in the city screen, you can use [LEFT ARROW] and [RIGHT ARROW] to cycle between cities...
TEXT.Chinese: While in the city screen, you can use [LEFT ARROW] and [RIGHT ARROW] to cycle between cities...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + B] to toggle Bare Map view...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + B] to toggle Bare Map view...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + R] to toggle Flag Resources view...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + R] to toggle Flag Resources view...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + Y] to toggle Show Yields view...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + Y] to toggle Show Yields view...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + A] to force all units with queued orders to move...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + A] to force all units with queued orders to move...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + T] to toggle the Tile Grid.
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + T] to toggle the Tile Grid.

TEXT.English: Press [ALT + Q] to retire from the game...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [ALT + Q] to retire from the game...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + W] to access the Worldbuilder...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + W] to access the Worldbuilder...

TEXT.English: Press [W] or [ENTER] to cycle through your active units...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [W] or [ENTER] to cycle through your active units...

TEXT.English: Press [/] to scroll through active workers...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [/] to scroll through active workers...

TEXT.English: Press [COMMA] and [PERIOD] to scroll through units on the same square...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [COMMA] and [PERIOD] to scroll through units on the same square...

TEXT.English: Press [SHIFT + ENTER] to force the turn to end...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [SHIFT + ENTER] to force the turn to end...

TEXT.English: Hold down the ALT key while mousing-over a plot to view the combat odds for an attack...
TEXT.Chinese: Hold down the ALT key while mousing-over a plot to view the combat odds for an attack...

TEXT.English: To view combat odds, hold down the right mouse button on the target tile...
TEXT.Chinese: To view combat odds, hold down the right mouse button on the target tile...

TEXT.English: Press [HOME] and [END] to cycle through your cities...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [HOME] and [END] to cycle through your cities...

TEXT.English: Press [INSERT] to open up the nearest friendly city...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [INSERT] to open up the nearest friendly city...

TEXT.English: Hold down the [SHIFT] key to add items to the end of your city's build queue...
TEXT.Chinese: Hold down the [SHIFT] key to add items to the end of your city's build queue...

TEXT.English: Hold down the [CTRL] key to insert items at the beginning of your city's build queue...
TEXT.Chinese: Hold down the [CTRL] key to insert items at the beginning of your city's build queue...

TEXT.English: Hold down the [ALT] key to have a city build an item indefinitely...
TEXT.Chinese: Hold down the [ALT] key to have a city build an item indefinitely...

TEXT.English: Press the forward and back buttons on your mouse to cycle through units on the same plot...
TEXT.Chinese: Press the forward and back buttons on your mouse to cycle through units on the same plot...

TEXT.English: Hold down the [CTRL] key and spin the mouse-wheel to cycle through units on the same plot...
TEXT.Chinese: Hold down the [CTRL] key and spin the mouse-wheel to cycle through units on the same plot...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + M] to toggle the music on and off...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + M] to toggle the music on and off...

TEXT.English: Move units to a distant tile by right-clicking on it...
TEXT.Chinese: Move units to a distant tile by right-clicking on it...

TEXT.English: You can group move all units of the same type by a [CTRL + RIGHT-CLICK] on the destination...
TEXT.Chinese: You can group move all units of the same type by a [CTRL + RIGHT-CLICK] on the destination...

TEXT.English: You can group move all units on the same tile by a [ALT + RIGHT-CLICK] on the destination...
TEXT.Chinese: You can group move all units on the same tile by a [ALT + RIGHT-CLICK] on the destination...

TEXT.English: Enter "Go-To" Mode by pressing [G]...
TEXT.Chinese: Enter "Go-To" Mode by pressing [G]...

TEXT.English: Enter "Go-To (Same Unit Type)" Mode by pressing [CTRL + G]...
TEXT.Chinese: Enter "Go-To (Same Unit Type)" Mode by pressing [CTRL + G]...

TEXT.English: Enter "Go-To (All Units)" Mode by pressing [ALT + G]...
TEXT.Chinese: Enter "Go-To (All Units)" Mode by pressing [ALT + G]...

TEXT.English: Press [C] to center the camera on the active unit...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [C] to center the camera on the active unit...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + C] to select all units of the same type as the active unit...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + C] to select all units of the same type as the active unit...

TEXT.English: Press [ALT + C] to select all units on the same tile as the active unit...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [ALT + C] to select all units on the same tile as the active unit...

TEXT.English: If you hold down the [SHIFT] key while clicking on the city bar, you can "select" multiple cities - allowing you to change production in multiple cities. You can also [SHIFT + RIGHT-CLICK] to set a rally point.
TEXT.Chinese: If you hold down the [SHIFT] key while clicking on the city bar, you can "select" multiple cities - allowing you to change production in multiple cities. You can also [SHIFT + RIGHT-CLICK] to set a rally point.

TEXT.English: If you hold down the [CTRL] key while clicking on the city bar, you will "select" all of your cities on that continent.
TEXT.Chinese: If you hold down the [CTRL] key while clicking on the city bar, you will "select" all of your cities on that continent.

TEXT.English: If you hold down the [ALT] key while clicking on the city bar, you will "select" all of your cities in the world.
TEXT.Chinese: If you hold down the [ALT] key while clicking on the city bar, you will "select" all of your cities in the world.

TEXT.English: Press the middle mouse button to exit the city screen...
TEXT.Chinese: Press the middle mouse button to exit the city screen...

TEXT.English: You can give a unit consecutive orders by pressing the SHIFT key. For example, you could tell a worker to build a road and then a mine by clicking on both buttons while holding down SHIFT...
TEXT.Chinese: You can give a unit consecutive orders by pressing the SHIFT key. For example, you could tell a worker to build a road and then a mine by clicking on both buttons while holding down SHIFT...

TEXT.English: Hold down SHIFT and click on a tile to open a context menu...
TEXT.Chinese: Hold down SHIFT and click on a tile to open a context menu...

TEXT.English: The NUMPAD arrow keys can be used to jump between cities when the city screen is up...
TEXT.Chinese: The NUMPAD arrow keys can be used to jump between cities when the city screen is up...

TEXT.English: Press [\] to jump back to the last selected unit...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [\] to jump back to the last selected unit...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + TAB] to view the turn event log...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + TAB] to view the turn event log...

TEXT.English: Press [ALT + S] to add a sign to the map...
TEXT.Chinese: Press [ALT + S] to add a sign to the map...

TEXT.English: Press [CTRL + H] to select all wounded units in a tile.
TEXT.Chinese: Press [CTRL + H] to select all wounded units in a tile.
